actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 14, United States Code, to authorize the Commandant of the United States Coast Guard to lease tidelands and submerged lands under control of the Coast Guard for periods longer than five years.
short_title: Federal Submerged Lands Transportation Development Act

titles.title: Federal Submerged Lands Transportation Development Act

A bill to amend title 14, United States Code, to authorize the Commandant of the United States Coast Guard to lease tidelands and submerged lands under control of the Coast Guard for periods longer than five years.
